title: Keybindings Dont Work - Every other game this happens
body:
Q W E R B F D 1 2 3 4 5 6 S 

all of them dont work. Spam them 100 times dont work. No lag, happens every other game. I reload it still doesnt work. Reset still doesnt work.

If the answer is I have to send system files to league every time this happens then the game has become unplayable. 

This bug has been around since Season 4 and yet its only gotten worse.

Edit: Restarted 8 times and did nothing

replies.body:
It sounds like your config might have corrupted, so it's not picking anything up.  Try performing a a reset to see if that fixes the problem.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if it helps!
